SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AuthController
 
CustomUserDetails
CustomUserDetails is a custom implementation of the Spring Security UserDetails interface.
CustomUserServiceImpl
CustomUserServiceImpl is an implementation of the Spring Security UserDetailsService interface.
GlobalExceptionHandler
GlobalExceptionHandler is a centralized exception handler for the application.
JwtAuthenticationDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for JWT authentication tokens.
JwtFilter
JwtFilter is a custom filter that intercepts incoming HTTP requests to validate JWT tokens.
JwtService
JwtService is a service responsible for generating, validating, and refreshing JWT tokens.
OneMediaTestTaskApplication
The main entry point for the OneMediaTestTask application.
Post
Entity class representing a post in the system.
PostController
 
PostRepository
PostRepository is a Spring Data JPA repository interface for performing CRUD operations on the "Post" entity.
PostService
PostService is a service class that handles operations related to posts.
RefreshTokenDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for handling refresh tokens.
SecurityConfig
SecurityConfig is a configuration class for Spring Security.
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for setting up Swagger (OpenAPI) documentation.
User
Represents a user entity in the system.
UserController
 
UserCredentialsDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for user credentials.
UserDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for user details.
UserMapper
UserMapper is an interface that defines the mapping between the User entity and the UserDto.
UserRepository
UserRepository is a Spring Data JPA repository interface for performing CRUD operations on the "User" entity.
UserService
UserService is an interface that defines the contract for user-related operations, including signing in, refreshing tokens, fetching user details, adding a new user, and logging out.
UserServiceImpl
Implementation of the UserService interface.
